changelog.md.Pour rappel s'il n'y a pas d'information: As a reminder if there is no information on the update, it means that it only concerns the updating of documentation, translation or text
changelog.md.Correction d'un bug sur me thermostat: Fixed a bug on my thermostat
changelog.md.Correction d'un bug sur les équipements: Fixed a bug on devices using Controller Mode
changelog.md.Correction d'un bug sur l'affichage des: Fixed a bug on the display of NOK equipment
changelog.md.Suite a la mise à jour il faut refaire u: Following the update it is necessary to redo a detection of the equipment from Alexa
changelog.md.Correction d'un bug sur les scenes lors: Fixed a bug on scenes when renaming an order / equipment / item
changelog.md.Possibilité de choisir le mode du thermo: Possibility to choose the thermostat mode (only with a thermostat from the jeedom thermostat plugin and if the modes are called heat, cool, off, auto, eco
changelog.md.Possibilité d'activer la rotation automa: Possibility of activating the automatic rotation of the API key
changelog.md.Correction d'un soucis sur la commande d: Correction of a problem with the shutter descent control
changelog.md.Correction d'un soucis sur l'allumage de: Fixed a problem with lighting the lamps
changelog.md.Correction de soucis sur la decouverte d: Correction of concerns about equipment discovery
changelog.md.Préparation du support de la synchronisa: Preparing for synchronization support without cache
changelog.md.Correction d'un bug sur les thermostats: Correction of a bug on thermostats
changelog.md.Corretion de bug sur la geestion de mult: Bug correction on the management of multiple generic type of type state
changelog.md.Envoi automatique des informations au ma: Automatic sending of information to the market when installing the plugin
changelog.md.Possibilité d'inverser le sens des volet: Possibility to reverse the direction of the flaps
changelog.md.Possibilité d'avoir les informations sur: Possibility of having information on the generic type required when clicking on the NOK label
changelog.md.Ajout de d'information et d'un lien vers: Addition of information and a link to the Voice Assistant service
changelog.md.a partir du 01\/06\/2019 les services vo: from 01/06/2019 the voice services become chargeable, you can see your status on your profile page on the market, tab my services
changelog.md.Correction d'un bug sur les volets: Correction of a bug on the panes
changelog.md.Correction de nombreux bug sur les retou: Correction of many bugs on status returns (light, outlet, temperature, thermostat
changelog.md.Correction d'un bug indiquant un soucis: Correction of a bug indicating a server problem
changelog.md.Correction d'un bug lors de l'envoi de l: Correction of a bug when sending the configuration
changelog.md.Correction d'un bug lors de la demande d: Correction of a bug during the temperature request

index.md.Ce plugin permet de faire le lien entre: This plugin makes it possible to make the link between your Jeedom and Alexa
index.md.Il peut fonctionner en passant par un se: It can operate through a cloud service provided by Jeedom
index.md.Le plugin necessite un abonnement aux se: The plugin requires a subscription to voice services
index.md.AMAZON impose que votre Jeedom soit acce: AMAZON requires that your Jeedom be accessible in HTTPS (the plugin does not work in HTTP) with a valid certificate (therefore no self-signed certificate
index.md.Grâce aux Service Pack Power ou Ultimate: Thanks to the Power or Ultimate Service Packs, your Jeedom is accessible via HTTPS
index.md.Si vous disposez d'un Service Pack Commu: If you have a Community Service Pack, you must install yourself an SSL certificate issued by a certification authority (ex
index.md.Le plugin ne supporte pas les équipement: The plugin does not support equipment with dual functions (2 output as certain zwave Fibaro module
index.md.Il faut absolument passer par 2 virtuels: You absolutely have to go through 2 virtual ones to break it down
index.md.Il est important de faire les étapes sui: It is important to do the following steps in the order listed
index.md.Après l'installation du plugin, il vous: After installing the plugin, you just need to go to the configuration part of the plugin then click on send the configuration to the market
index.md.Une fois le service bien actif il faut s: Once the service is active, you have to on the Alexa app or on the
index.md.aller dans la partie skill et chercher l: go to the skill part and look for the Jeedom skill then activate it, there it will ask you for identifiers you must put those from the market (be careful to put your market identifiers and not those of your Jeedom
index.md.Si vous avez un message d'erreur vous in: If you have an error message telling you that your user password or not is not correct you must
index.md.vérifier qu'Amazon Alexa est bien en act: check that Amazon Alexa is active in the market
index.md.si c'est bien le cas, etês vous sur de v: if this is the case, be sure of your identifiers (attention you must respect upper / lower case
index.md.si c'est le cas changer votre mot de pas: if this is the case change your password on the market and on the configuration of the voice assistant service (market profiles page tab my services) have it saved
index.md.Toute modification de configuration des: Any modification to the configuration of the equipment transmitted to Alexa (addition of equipment, deletion of equipment, change of a generic type of an order) necessarily requires going to Plugin -> Communication -> Alexa and then saving and in the Alexa application to redo a discovery
index.md.Sur votre Jeedom, allez sur Plugin -> Co: On your Jeedom, go to Plugin -> Communication -> Alexa and in the equipment section select the equipment to be transmitted to Alexa as well as the type of equipment
index.md.Le plugin se base sur les types génériqu: The plugin is based on the generic Jeedom types of commands to control your home automation
index.md.Il est donc très important de configurer: It is therefore very important to configure these correctly
index.md.Pour les modes il en faut MINIMUM deux s: For the modes you need MINIMUM two otherwise Amazon refuses the configuration and nothing will synchronize
index.md.Vous pouvez aussi créer des scènes dans: You can also create scenes in the scene tab, with input and output actions
index.md.Si vous n'envoyez aucun équipement (aucu: If you do not send any equipment (no OK in the equipment list on the Alexa plugin), Amazon considers that it is an error and uses the last known configuration
index.md.Donc si vous faite oublier tout et n'env: So if you forget everything and do not send any equipment amazon will take the last known configuration and therefore will make everything reappear
index.md.J'ai lu que le plugin necessiterait un a: I read that the plugin would require a subscription, why
index.md.C'est assez simple, Jeedom est une solut: It's quite simple, Jeedom is a non-cloud solution (hear everything is at home there is no server on our side for your Jeedom) but Alexa can only send requests to a single server for a skill
index.md.On a donc été obligé de faire un serveur: So we had to make a server that receives all requests from Alexa and retransmits them to your Jeedom
index.md.Malheureusement se serveur (en plus du c: Unfortunately server (in addition to the cost of development and maintenance) at a rental cost on our side
index.md.Voila pourquoi il y aura un abonnement p: This is why there will be a subscription for the service "Voice Assistant" which will cover both Amazon and Google (don't worry for the price it will be minimal, the goal is just to amortize the cost of the server
index.md.Pour ouvrir\/fermer les volets je dois d: To open / close the shutters I must say turn on / off
index.md.C'est normal Alexa ne supporte pas les é: This is normal Alexa does not support opening type equipment (for security reasons) so you have to make it believe that it is a light
index.md.Par contre grace aux routines vous pouve: By cons thanks to the routines you can say open / close
index.md.Alexa me dis \"l'appareil ne répond pas\: Alexa tells me "the device does not respond" while the action is well done
index.md.Regardez vos types génériques, Alexa néc: Look at your generic types, Alexa absolutely requires a status return otherwise it will tell you that the device is not responding
index.md.Attention aussi au délai pour faire l'ac: Also pay attention to the delay to do the action if it is too long you will get the message the device does not respond
index.md.Lors de l'association j'ai une erreur (m: During the association I have an error (but not on a problem of password / username
index.md.Si vous avez une erreur lors de l'associ: If you have an error during the association with Jeedom it probably comes from the fact that you did not add / transmit equipment before making the association
index.md.Pour corriger aller sur Plugins -> Commu: To correct go to Plugins -> Communication -> Alexa then ticked at least one piece of equipment to transmit and save (check that the piece of equipment is in OK, if it is in NOK click on the NOK to see why or ask about generic type in jeedom
index.md.Lors de l'ajout des équipement j'ai des: When adding equipment I have NOK
index.md.Cliquez simplement sur le NOK une fenetr: Just click on the NOK a window will tell you the generic type to have on the equipment controls for it to work
index.md.L'ajout d'équipement\/scene n'apparait p: Adding equipment / scene does not appear in the alexa application
index.md.supprimé tous mes équipements transmis (: deleted all my transmitted equipment (green OK) from the Alexa plugin
index.md.oublié\" tous mes équipement jeedom visi: forgot "all my jeedom equipment visible in the Connected Home section of Alexa.amazon
index.md.dans plugin -> gestion de plugin puis al: in plugin -> plugin management then alexa click on "send the configuration to the market
